constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 78 (Tuesday, May 10, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCARTHY:
H.R. 7690.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
Article 1, Section 9, clause 7 of the Constitution of the
United States
[Page H4798]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Management, and Accountability.

title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to establish or carry out the activities of a Disinformation Governance Board of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
